notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: E.N. and V.D.F. conceived and designed the experiments; V.D.F., O.C., L.D.M. and M.M. provided reagents, materials, and analysis tools; E.N., A.M., O.H., G.A. and M.S. carried out microbiological and anti-quorum sensing assays. All authors discussed the data obtained and collaborated in drafting the manuscript.
